730080.name: Wunderdoktor - Official Soundtrack
730080.description:
The Official Soundtrack for Wunderdoktor, including 24 Tracks.

All the songs were handcrafted by Konstantin & Elenor Kopka.
By listening to the soundtrack, you will be able to relive the game's journey in a different way.

This purchase contains 24 songs as 320 kbps High Quality MP3

After dowloading, you will find the file "Wunderdoktor - Official Soundtrack.zip" in your game folder (the one with the executable: Steam/steamapps/common/Wunderdoktor)

Tracklist:


01 - Main Theme
02 - Act 1 Theme - The Earnest Plains
03 - The Early Bird
04 - The Quacks - Hans Meise
05 - Tunnel to Greenrealm
06 - Act 2 Theme - Greenrealm
07 - The Town Amuser - Cheerful
08 - The Town Amuser - Drunk
09 - The Quacks - Irma Bienenfresser
10 - Tunnel to the Coal Mines
11 - Act 3 Theme - The Coal Mines
12 - The Quacks - Rita Aaskraehe
13 - Escape from Red Mountain
14 - Act 4 Theme - The Ocean Floor
15 - The Inspector
16 - The Quacks - Mikael Moewe
17 - Entering Beaktown
18 - Act 5 Theme - Beaktown
19 - Quack Finale - Hans Meise
20 - Quack Finale - Irma Bienenfresser
21 - Quack Finale - Rita Aaskraehe
22 - Quack Finale - Mikael Moewe
23 - Quack Finale - Vincent Rabe
24 - Golden Glow
730080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
